{T}: Attach target Fortification or Equipment you control to target permanent it could fortify or equip.
At the beginning of your end step, if you activated nine or more different abilities this turn [i](including mana abilities)[/i], transform Sanctum Constructor.
rules_text2: You may pay {0} rather than pay the cost of the first ability you activate during each of your turns that isn’t a mana ability. [i](Fortify and equip abilities are activated.)[/i]
